alert.note: Alert for Lanai Leeward (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 20 at 1:00PM HST until December 21 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF LANAI UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... .A powerful northwest swell will peak this afternoon and tonight, then gradually lower on Wednesday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Surf 8 to 12 feet. * WHERE...West facing shores of Lanai. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
